thread.title: Martin Luther King, Jr. honored at memorial

title: Martin Luther King, Jr. honored at memorial
text:
Martin Luther King, Jr. honored at memorial Monday, January 15, 2018 - 01:46 
The son of Martin Luther King, Jr., Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke and FBI Director Christopher Wray honored the civil rights leader at the MLK Jr. memorial in Washington on Monday. Rough Cut
